OOC:  You do know their's been a restart don't you?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> OOC: its been a long time but ive decided to come back to the 
nbwrpg. Its 
> like comin back home after a long vacation. Some of you may 
remember me some 
> may not but im back and plan to have a little fun
> 
>     Destructor's circuits came online. He had been in sleep 
underneath the 
> earth's crust for almost a year. His gears squeaked as they came 
into motion. 
> His optical sensors came online. His hand sprung from the ground. 
He gripped 
> hard and managed to pull himself out. His body was messed up pretty 
bad. He 
> would need a new beast mode. He basically put himself into an 
automatic 
> restart his body turned into a protoform type state. The black 
light emanated 
> from him scanning for a body. It picked up a lion. He transformed 
into this 
> new mode. Except for his Lion from had a  a black mane. He ran up 
the hill 
> scanning for the nearest  predacon base. He sent out a distress 
signal with 
> his location.
> 
>  Proto crawled out of his hole. His circuits had been frozen and he 
had been 
> stuck in-between forms. (For all those unfamiliar with proto hes a 
rip off of 
> that terminator 2 thing) He took the form of  a hawk and flew 
through the 
> sky. (When proto is in an animal form which he needs to do every 
day at least 
> twice to stay alive he has no more than the ability the animal 
gives him) His 
> dark spark pulsated for destruction. He sent out a call for a 
predacon base 
> to pick him up. (whoever wants a new recruit just be the first to 
answer.
> 
>   Galvatron awakened. Much to the dread of the planets. His silver 
dragon 
> mode shined in the sunlight. It had been a long sleep but he was 
finally 
> rejuvenated after his dreadful defeat by Optimus Prime. (in my last 
posts 
> here me and another rpg'er had a nice battle between optimus prime 
and 
> Galvatron which ended with both thier deaths) Even the his great 
spark could 
> not keep him down. He would stay quiet for now. He would wait and 
watch the 
> happenings of the planets before he reentered himself into it.
